app.name: FreelancerOS
app.tagline: Manage your business - invoices, clients, projects, and taxes

businessField.title: Business Field

profile.cropHint: Drag to position, scroll to zoom

onboarding.title: Welcome to FreelancerOS!
onboarding.subtitle: Let's set everything up in a few steps
onboarding.step4Desc: Create your first invoice or upload a document
onboarding.step1Desc: Here you'll find an overview of your financial data
onboarding.step2Desc: Each tile shows different information - balances, trends, and expenses
onboarding.step3Desc: Select a date range to filter dashboard data
onboarding.step4Desc: Use the sidebar menu to navigate between pages
onboarding.step5Desc: Press Ctrl+K for quick search across the system
onboarding.step6Desc: The quick add button lets you create transactions, clients, and invoices
onboarding.step7Desc: Great! You're ready to go. You can always repeat the tour from Settings.
onboarding.allDoneDesc: You're all set up and ready to manage your business.

search.hint: Type at least 2 characters to search

alerts.title: Alerts
alerts.budgetExceededDesc: You exceeded the {{category}} budget: spent {{spent}} of {{budget}}
alerts.subtitle: Stay informed about important events
alerts.paymentDueDesc: Payment of {{amount}} for {{description}} is due on {{date}}

voice.title: Voice Input
voice.notSupported: Voice recording not supported in this browser
voice.hint: Say the transaction, e.g.: "Expense of 150 for a meal"
voice.hintExpanded: Say an action like: 'Expense of 200 for a meal' or 'Add new client named David'
voice.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.
voice.parseFailed: Could not understand the request. Please try again.
voice.invoiceRedirect: You'll be redirected to the invoices page to create a new invoice.

upload.title: Upload Documents
upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop a file here
upload.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, CSV, XLS, XLSX, JPG, PNG
upload.accountHint: Select the account to import transactions into
upload.dragDropHint: Drag files here or click to browse
upload.duplicateReviewIntro: Found transactions that may be duplicates. Choose which to import.
upload.emptyStateDescription: Upload bank statements, invoices, or receipts and we'll extract transactions automatically
upload.fileTypesHint: PDF, CSV, XLS, XLSX, JPG, PNG
upload.noAccountsYet: No accounts yet. Add an account in Settings.
upload.ocrMayTakeMinute: Image recognition may take up to a minute
upload.selectFileAndAccount: Select a file and account to begin

tips.title: Tips
tips.dashboardTip: Customize your dashboard by clicking the settings icon in any widget
tips.transactionTip: You can bulk-edit transactions by selecting multiple rows
tips.invoiceTip: Send invoices directly to clients via email
tips.budgetTip: Set up budgets to receive alerts when spending exceeds your limits
tips.voiceTip: Use voice input to quickly add transactions hands-free
tips.uploadTip: Upload bank statements to automatically import transactions
tips.shortcutTip: Press Ctrl+K to quickly search across all your data
tips.recurringTip: The system automatically detects recurring payments from your transactions
tips.taxTip: Keep all business expenses categorized for easier tax filing
tips.goalsTip: Set financial goals and track your progress over time
